text:
Hi. Looking for someone to help us attack our SEO recommendations in HubSpot CMS and get our PageSpeed score up. Primarily the developer side of things to increase page performance where possible. For example, here are the top recommendations we’re looking to resolve:

1. Reduce how long the page is blocked from responding to user input
2. Reduce page layout shifts
The entire site is built in HubSpot CMS, so we’re looking for an expert! You can see where we’re lacking in performance :slightly_smiling_face: .

Plenty of people in here should be able to do this. If you aren’t able to find someone to make this happen, we’d love to check this out at <http://deckerdevs.com|deckerdevs.com>. We might be a bit overkill for what you need.
<@U05KCU0E2QG> can’t recommend deckerdevs enough, been lucky enough to work with them myself. Nick is a true OG in the Web dev and HubSpot world
